item.title: More devs on devops with Docker Orchestration.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Docker tools are the new era to build, deploy and scale applications easily. After more than one year of using this technology in production I’d like to share the benefits and disavantages of having docker in both env (development and production), the bad and good practices all the workflow to speedup deployments, and how […]
item.content:encoded: The Docker tools are the new era to build, deploy and scale applications easily. After more than one year of using this technology in production I’d like to share the benefits and disavantages of having docker in both env (development and production), the bad and good practices all the workflow to speedup deployments, and how to to fit PHP in this new world.
